eu.first.RIM

Class HtmlWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.first.RIM.HtmlWriter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Html5Writer

    public class HtmlWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    HtmlWriter writes to an output html file. It maintains file name and an internal StringBuffer, which is actually written to external file on close().
    Since:
    2012-10-22
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marko Bohanec (marko.bohanec@ijs.si)

    • Field Summary

      protected java.lang.StringBuffer sb
      StringBuffer holding file contents.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
